title: Yes I got wafflestomped, but I 100% believe this Cassiopeia is scripting.
body:
https://plays.tv/video/5ab3198a98e2f69b35/100-scripting-cass?oreferer=notifications

Look at the 5 man gank on him, he Q's me directly on top of me and then perfectly ults the two members ganking him from behind, gets stunned by the grace of God and luckily we kill him. Almost every single Q this guy throws is perfectly in the center. Keep in mind this is Silver-Gold and hes on a new account (wonder what he got banned for? hehe xd).

replies.body:
The one thing that makes me suspicious is how his Q is always timed so well to your dashes. Aside from that, there were also a few times where he straight up fucked up.

Not sure how Riot even can figure out if someone's scripting, but IMO, it's kind of 50/50 if he was or not. Maybe 40/60 in favor of not scripting.
That's what got me, almost every Q the entire game was dead center and he dodged at least 9/10 of my chains perfectly, but I've had that happen before I guess

> [{quoted}](name=The Headbutter,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eU9Bhn1R,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-03-22T03:11:40.296+0000)
>
> That's what got me, almost every Q the entire game was dead center and he dodged at least 9/10 of my chains perfectly, but I've had that happen before I guess

I went ahead and looked through the match history, and found something really suspicious. Before today, that guy's last game was almost 2 years ago. 

I have some questions about it, but all of them are speculative questions. For now, if you reported him with the accusation of cheating, then I guess that's all that can really be done.
Yeah I reported, hopefully if he's cheating they'll take care of it.. or if he's just that amazing then enjoy the climb, lol.
Could be a smurf. None of those seemed particularly impossible. The Jax and Nami show up on bottom side bush with ample time to see and respond to

A very high smurf then, with all the Twitch-fast reflexes of movement spacing (kiting/orb walking), aiming of Qs, always predicting LB to land on her instead of the side and using chains. It's really suspicious.
Yeah, basically I solo killed him super early before this vid starts, and all of a sudden it was like he was a God and couldn't make any mistakes.
No. If you know what scripting is, AOE on demand abilities appear in the center of the enemy. Watch Cass Q's, insanely obvious. She turns them off periodically, example being when Jax pounces them.

Actually the better scripts use a Huminzer effect to try to avoid detection.   So what that does is very slightly of center the cast in varying directions.  The key with this is that it is almost always the same offset.

He went 2-10 as one of his other games on Akali (3 total games played is the unfortunate sample size), and almost every single Q is DEAD center. Hard for me to believe, but lot better than me I guess.

48 seconds.   She ults then gets caught by the nami bubble.   However watch the pathing.   It is the exact shortest pathing to avoid the bubble.   The only reason that it landed was the fact she was immobile while ulting.    The movement was also toward her enemys tower and team.   That is very unusual decision making other then that it is the shortest pathing to try to avoid the bubble.   


While I am not sure that was scripting I believe it probably was.   

Also at 33 sec you can see two abilities cast with no delay.... while that can be done notice the change in centering to match with the pathing of LB making it a noticable change in targeting within a almost impossible margin of time.

It looks like {{champion:7}} was absolutely showered in thick venom... 

I wonder if there's some way to profit from this video.

In the start of the frist clip, look at how she clicked. She clicked down, up, then down to dodge your E. then on you, then down to kite. Like instantly. 
 
insane. That's a script.

in the third clip, where she's hugging the wall. She twitches wierd. That's because she's clicking into the wall and away, but the script sees ur chain though so it doesnt let that through. Idk makes sense to me.

WHEN SHE'S FIGHTING THE RUMBLE XD

YEAH DUDE LMAO imagine what her mouse would look like if that was real. Imagine the mouse movements. The more I watch, the more Im seeing.

> Yes I got wafflestomped, but I 100% believe this Cassiopeia is scripting.

it's ROFLstomped....

Oh it was very obviously scripting. I'm sorry you had to deal with that.

The reactions to you, and specifically her stuttery micromovement, are an instant tip off. Even when using attack-move to its highest effectiveness, humans can't move like that.

As others have mentioned, her shortest-path dodges and her centre-aimed skillshots are clear tells as well.

It's a good thing you reported them.
Wow, I saw Faker play Cass in LCS once, and even he didn’t do stuff like this when he was on a tear.  That looks like a scripter to me.
very questionable.. Does look like he turned them "on" nearly every duel. But... *shrug*
Looks questionable, except for that totally boosted ult.
